Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-2953 affecting package openldap for versions less than 2.4.57-9
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-2953 affecting package openldap for versions less than 2.4.57-9. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openldap is earlier than 2.4.57-9, affected by CVE-2023-2953
